ch0289_00_nemo/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been
waiting for you!
ch0289_00_nemo/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s make today another fruitful day!
ch0289_00_nemo/7101_0701_01_10: The school I go to is in Paldea!
ch0289_00_nemo/7101_0701_02_10:
You can learn about tons of things other than
Pokémon, so that’s fun!
ch0289_00_nemo/7101_0701_03_10:
Getting to school can be really tough if you’re not
in the dorms ’cause there’s so many stairs!
ch0289_00_nemo/7102_0701_01_10:
There’s so many Pokémon on Pasio that you don’t
see in Paldea!
ch0289_00_nemo/7103_0701_01_10:
When you wanna have a Pokémon battle with
someone, approach them cheerfully and ask!
ch0289_00_nemo/7103_0701_02_10: That’s the way we do things in Paldea, but...
ch0289_00_nemo/7103_0701_03_10:
apparently, there’s places where making eye
contact means a Pokémon battle has to start.
ch0289_00_nemo/7104_0701_01_10:
I learned how to use my sync move as soon as I
came to Pasio.
ch0289_00_nemo/7104_0701_02_10: So now I have to see how much I can hone it!
ch0289_00_nemo/7105_0701_02_10:
You were having loads of battles with someone I
don’t know, weren’t you?
ch0289_00_nemo/7105_0701_03_10: If you’re gonna battle, let me join you!
ch0289_00_nemo/1701_0701_02_10: I’ve got lots, so I’ll share with you!
ch0289_00_nemo/1701_0702_01_10: Use them well so your efforts quickly bear fruit!
ch0289_00_nemo/2501_0701_01_10:
If I’m being honest, I’m not that good at
catching Pokémon.
ch0289_00_nemo/2501_0701_02_10: But there aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio...
ch0289_00_nemo/2501_0701_03_10:
So I’m kinda relieved. No one here will see that
uncool side of me...
ch0289_00_nemo/2501_0702_01_10: But I can’t be bad forever!
ch0289_00_nemo/2501_0702_02_10:
Let’s have a Pokémon-catching training session
sometime, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0289_00_nemo/2511_0701_01_10:
It’s impressive when someone gets really good
at something because they were passionate and
spent a lot of time on it!
ch0289_00_nemo/2511_0701_02_10: That’s not an easy thing for everyone to do...
ch0289_00_nemo/2511_0701_03_10:
I don’t think I’m incredible or anything, but I felt
set apart from everyone else.
ch0289_00_nemo/2511_0701_04_10:
Sometimes I’d go easy on my friends in battle
so we both could enjoy it.
ch0289_00_nemo/2511_0702_01_10:
But I don’t do that anymore. I always give it my
all now!
ch0289_00_nemo/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m also rivals with someone I might lose to, even
if I do go all out!
ch0289_00_nemo/2511_0702_03_10: And there’s so many Trainers like that on Pasio!
ch0289_00_nemo/2511_0702_04_10:
I’m having so much fun now because I can have
fruitful battles where both my opponents and I go
all out!
ch0289_00_nemo/3001_0701_01_10:
Buenas! Taking it easy in the morning is nice and
all, but you better not be late!
ch0289_00_nemo/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m having a sandwich for lunch today! I’m gonna
wolf it down so we can get to Pokémon battling!
ch0289_00_nemo/3005_0701_01_10:
With all the things that happened today, you must
be tired! Make sure to rest this evening!
